shortdesc.ph: Sets the audio parameters and application scenarios.
Sets the audio parameters and application scenarios.

ul.li: This method needs to be set before . If you call this method after , the settings do not take effect. This method needs to be set before . If you call this method after , the settings do not take effect.

In the COMMUNICATION and LIVE_BROADCASTING profiles, the bitrate may be different from your settings due to network self-adaptation. In the COMMUNICATION and LIVE_BROADCASTING profiles, the bitrate may be different from your settings due to network self-adaptation.

In scenes requiring high-quality audio, such as online music tutoring, Agora recommends you set profile as (4) and scenario as (3). In scenes requiring high-quality audio, such as online music tutoring, Agora recommends you set profile as (4) and scenario as (3).

pd.p: The sample rate, bitrate, encoding mode, and the number of channels. See . The sample rate, bitrate, encoding mode, and the number of channels. See .

plentry.pd: The audio application scenario. See . The audio application scenario. See . Under different audio scenarios, the device uses different volume types. Under different audio scenarios, the device uses different volume types. For details, see . For details, see .
